snippet: A measure introduced in the Maryland state legislature on Thursday is meant to stop colleges and universities from having access to students' social media postings.
abstract: A measure introduced in the Maryland state legislature on Thursday is meant to stop colleges and universities from having access to students' social media postings.
lead_paragraph: A bill introduced Thursday in the Maryland state legislature would stop colleges and universities from keeping digital tabs on student-athletes.

headline.main: Maryland Bill Addresses College Athletes' Social Media Privacy
